uk.ac.gla.abbi.abbi_library.gatt_communication

Class ABBIGattReadWriteCharacteristics

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.gla.abbi.abbi_library.gatt_communication.ABBIGattReadWriteCharacteristics

  • public class ABBIGattReadWriteCharacteristics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class includes the GATT attribute functions for reading and writing values from and to an ABBI bracelet device.

    The folloring implementations are present:

    - a list of ABBI characteristic UUIDs with descriptions - a lookup function for quick and easy UUID discovery - read and write functions for ABBI bracelet's attributes
